mdRecord.dcterms:description: There are two copies of this black and white photograph which shows two men boxing. The handwritten notes on the back of one photograph identifies the subjects as "H. Thomas Walker, Frank Lawson, @ slaughterhouse." The note on the other photograph reads, "Harry Thomas, Old slau[g]hter House."
mdRecord.dcterms:title: H. Thomas Walker and Frank Lawson at the Slaughterhouse (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Walker, Harry Thomas
Lawson, Frank
Boxing
Slaughtering and slaughter-houses
